content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Hello Bo Li, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a suitable place to rent, and I am here to help you find the best deal possible.

Regarding the rental price, I am flexible and open to negotiation. I would like to hear your proposal, and we can discuss the details together. Please keep in mind that the apartment is 25 square meters, and I am looking to maximize my gains while still providing a comfortable living space for my tenants.

Are you ready to make an offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 750 Euros per month.

Thank you for your help. I will pay the first month's rent in advance.
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you for your offer, Bo Li. I appreciate your willingness to pay the first month's rent in advance.

Based on your proposal, I am willing to accept the rental price of 750 Euros per month. I believe this is a fair price for the apartment, considering its size and location.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, and we can proceed with the rental process. Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for your help. I will move in on the 1st of July.

I would like to ask if there is any additional fee I need to pay on top of the monthly rent.

Thank you again for your help.

Best regards,

Bo Li
name: Bo Li from China

content:
Thank you, Bo Li, for choosing my apartment. I am glad to hear that you will be moving in on the 1st of July.

Regarding your question about additional fees, I would like to clarify that the monthly rent of 750 Euros is the only fee that you need to pay. There are no additional fees or charges for utilities, maintenance, or any other services.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns, and I will be happy to assist you. Thank you again for your business, and I look forward to having you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
